column1:
What are Speculation Rules?
The Speculation Rules API allows browsers to prefetch or prerender pages before users click on them, significantly improving navigation speed.

How it works:
‚Ä¢ Prefetch: Downloads page resources in advance (lower resource usage)
‚Ä¢ Prerender: Fully renders the page in background (faster but uses more resources)

Eagerness levels control when speculation triggers:
‚Ä¢ Eager: Immediately when the page loads
‚Ä¢ Moderate: After 200ms hover over the link
‚Ä¢ Conservative: On mouse/touch down (just before click)
